BSCCO - Lightning Network Superconductor

About BSCCO, a tool allowing LN node operators to implement non-HTLC mechanisms for channels

Peer to Peer Consensus

April 30, 2022
BSCCO enables individual Lightning channels, with their respective nodes' consent, to use mechanisms other than the Bitcoin blockchain as their settlement layer.

BSCCO enables individual Lightning channels, with their respective nodes' consent, to use mechanisms other than the Bitcoin blockchain as their settlement layer.
